name: Darkness Over the Hill
description:
Hi everybody! Syoudre here, thank you for trying out this script! This time it is purposely for the Bullet Hell Artistry 5: Unbelievable Allies contest held by Bullet Hell Engines. Where the theme is about making a boss battle where a selected Touhou character is paired with another character from a video game. The scenario of the script is inspired by the MMD video: Sanae learns the truth of the universe.

I haven't gone into detail of how Rumia and Sanae got into the world of Taikan. The Project where Claude and Cyaegha are from, my excuse was that Cyaegha spread a deep darkness to that point space warped and got Rumia and Sanae in the world of Taikan. I don't have a solid story for it but I really wanted to make a script about the characters from the Taikan Project.

The personalities of each character, especially the Taikan characters, might be wrong, so I apologize for that, may it be inaccurate.

Credits:

Darkness Over the Hill

By Syoudre

Discord: Syoudre#8210

Story / Graphic Design - UI / Sound / Programming / Claude & Cyaegha Portraits By Syoudre

All songs are from the album: Otherworldly Paradox, by Paradise of Boundaries, check it out!

~Until next time~
